name: XRSession.visibilityState
description: The read-only visibilityState property of the XRSession interface is a string indicating whether the WebXR content is currently visible to the user, and if it is, whether it's the primary focus.
content:
Secure context
This feature is available only in secure contexts (HTTPS), in some or all supporting browsers.

The read-onlyvisibilityStateproperty of the XRSession interface is a string indicating whether the WebXR content is currently visible to the user, and if it is, whether it's the primary focus.

Every time the visibility state changes, a visibilitychange event is fired on the XRSession object.
